text:
This is an emergency. We can not afford half measures.

I am proud to have introduced the only plan that will address the crisis we face. We need a Green New Deal now. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1199236475130466305 QT @washingtonpost ‘Bleak’ U.N. report says world on pace to warm nearly 4 degrees Celsius by 2100, urges rapid action to avoid worst of climate change https://www.washingtonpost.com/climate-environment/2019/11/26/bleak-report-un-says-drastic-action-is-only-way-avoid-worst-impacts-climate-change/

Let's be real about the health care debate in this primary. Some of my friends on the debate stage will take away your choice, while others could leave 10 million people uninsured.

My plan won’t do either. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKU7a-5XsAcR8Nb.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199426939288723457/vid/320x320/aMrM7BvLWkBZbJG3.mp4?tag=13

RT @sunrisemvmt Big Us > Big Oil https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1199346470387740674 QT @BernieSanders "He’s not there for Wall Street. He’s not there for Hollywood. He’s not there for big oil, or big pharma or big anybody. Just Big Us. And I’m good with Big Us." http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKTtBIlU8AESKWi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199341542135058436/vid/480x270/QOCtMjO_03ZA25It.mp4?tag=13

None of this is a critique on lawmakers who dial for dollars - they don’t want to be doing it in the first place.

But to change this system, we must push hard to change the corrupting role of money in politics. And yes, those forces exist among all parties.

We need to build a new farm economy that is truly open to all. I’ve listened to Black farmers and updated my plan to reflect their experiences. We must root out structural racism to ensure Black farmers succeed. https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/agenda-black-america?source=soc-WB-ew-tw

Airline catering workers shouldn’t have to choose between paying their bills or seeing a doctor. Today I joined @unitehere in calling on @AmericanAir, @United, and @Delta to raise the minimum wage of catering workers to $15/hr and benefits. One job should be enough to survive.

Failing to stop Russia’s Nord Stream 2 pipeline will vastly strengthen Putin's hands at the expense of the rest of the free world. Time is running out for the U.S. to act. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1197970903960866823/img/jMyUTe4wEHwjA2N7.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1197970903960866823/vid/480x270/NJdB1kKfoz7OYNqE.mp4?tag=13

But Warren’s & Bernie’s socialist policies would do wonders for the US economy.... https://twitter.com/obedmanuel/status/1199389225243873283 QT @obedmanuel Mexico entered recession in early 2019, dealing blow to president

https://www.reuters.com/article/us-mexico-economy-gdp/mexico-entered-recession-in-early-2019-dealing-blow-to-president-idUSKBN1XZ1JF

This month, my POW/MIA Flag Act became law. Starting this week, you’ll see this Flag flying with the US flag over the Capitol permanently. This symbol must now be displayed daily at many federal sites across the nation so we never forget our servicemembers who didn’t return home. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKUjqj_XkAIq9e-.jpg

RT @TeamTrump President @realDonaldTrump will be taking the stage in Sunrise shortly.

Here are some of the GREAT things he is doing for Florida!

#TrumpRally #TrumpHomecoming http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKUcDrIWoAUgW5f.png

I had so much fun cooking masala dosa with @mindykaling, and even got to meet her dad.
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKPvk4xX0AA9y8k.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199063573600915461/vid/480x270/4_JCf4TOJYpIIrcF.mp4?tag=13

@fineout @realDonaldTrump @GovRonDeSantis @mattgaetz @JimmyPatronis @AshleyMoodyFL I wish I could have. I have a family engagement with my kids. 

But as I told @Potus today in our conversation, welcome to your new home!

.@CFPB’s job is to enforce fair lending laws & stop discriminatory financial products. @SenSherrodBrown & I want @CFPBDirector to explain how @GoldmanSachs’ @Apple Card slipped through when women who apply may get worse terms than men with similar credit. https://thehill.com/policy/finance/472002-warren-brown-call-for-greater-enforcement-of-fair-lending-laws-after-goldman

Dream big, fight hard, put on your sweatshirt, and let’s get to work! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKVK-mtU8AANZgf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199443157454225408/vid/320x320/Y5mn3M49MtFeefFh.mp4?tag=13

We can’t defeat hate and bigotry with more hate—we must tackle it head-on with love and acts of kindness. Thank you Keri for recognizing this, and for fighting this darkness with light. The Syracuse community is stronger for it. 
  
https://www.syracuse.com/news/2019/11/syracuse-university-janitor-who-cleaned-racist-graffiti-replaces-it-with-kindness.html?fbclid=IwAR2dN116LsxNfdsn-dM-qg0HYFNA5mAFgpmfIoQunGd_c2hZEE0EU9WYZZw

My message to Mitch McConnell and the feckless Republicans who refuse to act to end gun violence: our children are dying. Enough with the political games. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKTn5ORWwAAmlhK.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199337875545960448/vid/320x320/1MJagbarkk52plC6.mp4?tag=13

RT @nowthisnews 'If you think a woman can't beat Donald Trump, Nancy Pelosi does it every single day' — Watch @amyklobuchar's answer to double standards for women http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1197366743561330688/img/ws2YZX6ozf3K8jdf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1197366743561330688/vid/320x320/CeC9yKwCHosjLIQG.mp4?tag=13

This is a full-blown crisis and Trump is only making it worse. 

Congress must demonstrate the guts to take on the fossil fuel industry and declare a climate emergency. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1199236475130466305 QT @washingtonpost ‘Bleak’ U.N. report says world on pace to warm nearly 4 degrees Celsius by 2100, urges rapid action to avoid worst of climate change https://www.washingtonpost.com/climate-environment/2019/11/26/bleak-report-un-says-drastic-action-is-only-way-avoid-worst-impacts-climate-change/

Last week, my bill to legalize marijuana passed through House committee with bipartisan support.

I’ll say it again: we can't legalize marijuana without addressing the injustices to people of color caused by the War on Drugs. My bill would do just that.

RT @sunrisemvmt This is a powerful new ad from @ewarren. Thank you for acknowledging the important role that a grassroots movement will play in stopping the climate crisis.

The #GreenNewDeal is the vision big enough to build that movement. https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1199330085184004096 QT @ewarren We need bold action now to pass the #GreenNewDeal, build a green new economy, and defeat the climate crisis—and I've got a plan for that. I'm proud to work alongside groups like @SunriseMvmt to build the grassroots movement we need to fight climate change. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKTerDMUUAcGVVj.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199327618757083136/vid/480x270/Ax63plmr0fRmCbq-.mp4?tag=13
This is, of course, not new:  Kurt Vonnegut’s 1961 classic Harrison Bergeron describes Bernie’s “socialist” sports powerfully.

Thank you, @UNITEHERE, for your courage. @AmericanAir made $1.4 billion in profits last year but refuses to pay workers fairly. When we are in the White House we will take on corporate greed and ensure all workers have a living wage and the right to join a union. https://twitter.com/unitehere/status/1199155825585086465 QT @unitehere Catering workers shouldn’t have to choose between paying their bills or getting medical treatment. Tell @AmericanAir that One Job Should Be Enough! #1job #1u #airportstrikealert

https://www.airportstrikealert.org/thx

While many try to belittle a progressive agenda that centers working people & the public good, in truth it’s more powerful than ever.

I haven’t picked up a phone once this year to dial for dollars, & I don’t meet w/ corp lobbyists. 

That is the power of your grassroots support. https://twitter.com/altochulo/status/1199460731256750080 QT @altochulo WOW. @AOC raised a jaw-dropping $1.4 million last quarter—more than Pelosi, & more than any other House Dem—with ZERO corporate backers.

Why? Because people across her district, her state, & the country knows she stands for something. She stands for us.

https://nypost.com/2019/11/26/aoc-raised-most-money-among-house-dems-during-reelection-campaign/

RT @ninaturner The ruling class doesn’t stand a chance against #BigUs. When you are willing to fight for someone you don’t know, there is nothing we can’t accomplish. Every person deserves to live with dignity. No one will tell us our ambitions are naive or unreachable. #Bernie2020 https://twitter.com/abshirdsm/status/1199360656622923778 QT @AbshirDSM You’ve heard of Big Oil, Big Pharma, and Big Money. 

None of them stand a chance against #BigUs 
 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKTtBIlU8AESKWi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199341542135058436/vid/480x270/QOCtMjO_03ZA25It.mp4?tag=13

Trump, a tax dodger who abused and cheated his own workers, has done everything he can to get the government to enrich the billionaire class.

Any wonder why Amazon gets away with injuring its warehouse employees and paying $0 in federal taxes? https://twitter.com/TheAtlantic/status/1199039118598164480 QT @TheAtlantic Speedy robots. Constant surveillance. Ruthless quotas. A new @reveal investigation into why the injury rate for Amazon’s warehouse workers is sky-high: https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2019/11/amazon-warehouse-reports-show-worker-injuries/602530/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_term=2019-11-25T17%3A15%3A06&utm_campaign=the-atlantic&utm_content=edit-promo

RT @dbongino This happens to virtually all conservative YouTube channels with any sort of a following. Mine included. 👇🏻 https://twitter.com/scottadamssays/status/1199417144343060480 QT @ScottAdamsSays On my YouTube channel, where I post Periscope replays, my audience grows every month while my ad revenue declines every month. I'm generally demonetized immediately (for no reason) and reversed on manual review every time, but only after most traffic has passed. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKUviR_U4AAtRHI.png

Coming up soon: catch me slow jam the news on @FallonTonight at 11:35 ET. Thanks for having me on!

Photos: Andrew Lipovsky/NBC http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKWdQL9X0AEB9pX.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKWdQL-WsAQxpmZ.jpg

I'm incredibly proud of my team who pulled this video together. We want to continue to push out content like this and share my story with voters, but we can't do it without resources. Will you chip in $20 today?
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kdh-social-november-challenge?refcode=tw19127-KDH

Citizens United has fundamentally changed the foundation of our political system, giving the top 1% an unfair advantage in our elections. Let's get big money out of politics. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKU_nHJX0AEDOYX.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199434539245981698/vid/480x270/Lvpnj2LJEszNETJR.mp4?tag=13

Fighting for the #GreenNewDeal isn't just about fighting climate change. It's a commitment to building a better future for the working people of our country by creating millions of good union jobs. We can’t fight climate change with a low-wage economy.

Google is too big, too powerful, and its anti-worker actions will end when we are in the White House. We are going to break up Google and stand up for workers against powerful tech monopolies. https://twitter.com/nytimesbusiness/status/1199133443738816513 QT @nytimesbusiness Google said in a memo on Monday that it had fired four workers who had been involved with employee activism at the company https://trib.al/JNiN0TX

Don't talk to me about legalizing marijuana if you're not also talking about investing in the communities that have been ravaged by the failed War on Drugs. The end we seek is not just legalization—it's justice.

Great news for #OsceolaCounty! @FEMA is reimbursing the area more than $1.5 million to restore damages to the administration building, parking structure, and courthouse building as a result of #HurricaneIrma #sayfie #flapol

In the 2 yrs they’ve controlled @CFPB, @MickMulvaneyOMB & @CFPBDirector have gutted its fair lending office, stripped it of exam & enforcement powers, & failed to file even 1 equal credit enforcement action. Could it be that banks know they can discriminate without consequences?

Some CEOs get paid more than 1,000 times their typical employee. Most Americans think the ratio should be 7 to 1.

If American corporations can't align closer with American values, then we are going to tax outrageous CEO pay until they do. https://www.cnn.com/2019/11/26/perspectives/ceo-pay-sanders-warren/index.html

America's oldest civil rights law is at risk of being narrowed and limited by the Supreme Court. This is wrong and we have to speak up and make our voices heard.

That's why I led my colleagues in a resolution affirming the importance of the law. https://www.blackenterprise.com/kamala-harris-maxine-waters-take-congressional-action-to-preserve-civil-rights-law/

Some billionaires figured it might be cheaper to run for president than pay my #WealthTax. Well they don’t have the power of a grassroots movement—and in our democracy, I believe in the power of people over money. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EKUnDipU0AAbzUO.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1199407344297201664/vid/320x320/mayNqtRt1VHvlKY8.mp4?tag=13

🏫Stop privatizing public schools
👩🏽‍🏫Fully fund public education
❌Cancel all student debt
⚖️Ensure that educators, parents, and students get the dignity and respect that they deserve

President Trump's trade-war-by-tweet with China is hurting cranberry farmers in MA & across the country. @SenMarkey, @USRepKeating, @RepJoeKennedy & I are urging the @USTradeRep to find new markets to compensate for China’s 40% tariffs on US cranberries. https://www.bostonglobe.com/news/politics/2019/11/26/massachusetts-lawmakers-seek-federal-help-for-cranberry-farmers-hurt-chinese-tariffs/aA7ufSDLMDEwkoAaBCb6GI/story.html

We must protect the most marginalized members of our communities, and that includes Black trans women who are facing violence at an alarming rate. https://projects.propublica.org/graphics/lgbtq-rights-rollback

Monopolies are bad for consumers and our economy—and they're bad for employees, too.

RT @trekonomics Public goods are the cornerstone of civilized society. The expansion of public goods, whether roads or knowledge, has brought us longer lifespans and more prosperous, more meaningful lives. We need more of them, not less. https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1198982812851986437 QT @AOC Public education, libraries, & infrastructure policies (which we‘ve had before in America and elsewhere in the world!) are not “free stuff.”

They are PUBLIC GOODS.

And they are worth investing in, protecting, & advancing for all society and future generations.

Sincerely,
NY-14 https://twitter.com/freedlander/status/1198760932446539777
Great news for #LeeCounty! @FEMA is reimbursing the area more than $11.4 million for debris removal as a result of #HurricaneIrma #sayfie #flapol

Californians: some evacuation orders have been lifted for the #CaveFire. This is welcome news for countless of residents who want nothing more than to be home for Thanksgiving. Keeping those affected in my thoughts and grateful for the tireless work of our firefighters. https://twitter.com/sbsheriff/status/1199413725175984129 QT @sbsheriff This is an update: The evacuation order for the areas West of Patterson to Fairview and North of Cathedral Oaks has been lifted. Other areas remain under an evacuation order

Google recently hired a notorious union-busting firm—and yesterday, fired four employees who were organizing their colleagues and holding Google accountable. I stand with Rebecca Rivers and her colleagues. I’ll always fight to protect workers’ rights. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/11/25/technology/google-fires-workers.html

We have got to end the private prison and detention racket in America, and reverse the racist criminalization of immigration. It is disgusting that ICE is trying to fast-track private prison contracts, which is why I support the California ban. https://www.desertsun.com/story/news/2019/11/21/coachella-prohibits-prisons-immigration-detention-centers-within-city-limits/4261285002/

Grateful for @UNITEHERE fighting for airline workers currently on strike. All workers deserve fair pay and meaningful benefits.
